result.trip_overview_narrative: Nexus International School Malaysia offers a variety of educational trips including residential trips and participation in The Duke of Edinburgh’s International Award from Year 9 onwards. These programs foster independence, resilience, leadership, teamwork, and global citizenship through service, skills development, physical challenges, expeditions, and excursions. Challenge Week allows learners to choose their own adventure, while the Year 12 Residential Trip broadens horizons and creates lasting memories beyond the classroom.

programs.program_name: The Duke of Edinburgh’s International Award

evidence.quote: From Year 9 onwards, learners can take part in The Duke of Edinburgh’s International Award, building resilience, leadership and a spirit of adventure. Through service, skills development, physical challenges and expeditions, learners grow in confidence and independence while making a positive impact on their communities.
Challenge Week allows them the freedom to choose their own adventure, fostering independence and resilience.
The Year 12 Residential Trip and other excursions broaden their horizons, building teamwork and creating lasting memories beyond the classroom.

unknowns: Specific destinations for trips and expeditions
Exact duration details for The Duke of Edinburgh’s International Award activities
Frequency details for The Duke of Edinburgh’s International Award and Year 12 Residential Trip
